Key:
(Spring. It's April, and the new school year has
begun. Although I was an ordinary student, I,
Shido Itsuka, felt my life change drastically.)

"(I encountered an unknown phenomenon
known as "spacequakes". At the center of
it, I encountered an extremely gorgeous girl.)"
...My name?
...I do not have such a thing.

(Our first time meeting was, for lack of a
better word, intense. It was also the first
time I looked death in the eye.)

(That's when I realized that spacequakes
were caused by girls with supernatural
powers, called Spirits.)
Welcome. Welcome to Ratatoskr.

(Ratatoskr was an organization that sought
to protect the Spirits. They briefed me on the
situation, and told me all about the dates...)

Shido, what do you want to call me?
Give me a name.
T-Tohka. What do you think...?

(She had claimed not to have a name, so I
decided to call her Tohka. Thus, Tohka and
I began our typical, but odd, relationship.)

(That all became complicated when Origami Tobiichi,
a classmate of mine affiliated with the AST, or
the Anti-Spirit Troop, accidentally shot me.)

(Tohka, enraged from seeing me get hurt,
tried to kill Origami. Somehow, I managed
to emerge unscathed and returned to Tohka.)
U-um... I know! Tohka! Let's k-kiss...!

(After kissing Tohka, her powers were sealed.
By kissing the Spirits, I could prevent the
spacequakes from happening.)
Will... you take me on another date soon...?
Yeah. Anytime you want.

(That's how my first interaction with a Spirit
went. Tohka and I took our first steps together
towards a future for both humans and Spirits.)

(After a while, the second Spirit appeared.
Her name was Yoshino.)
Please... don't hurt... me...
Um... is this... yours?

(She shivered like a lost puppy. When I handed
her puppet to her, something happened.)
Ya-haaa! Sorry, Onii-san. You saved me!

(Instead of shaking from fear, the girl raised
her voice in jubilation, using ventriloquism
to make the puppet talk.)

(Its name was Yoshinon, a personality
through which Yoshino spoke when her
shyness stopped her from using her own voice.)

(Immediately after I met Yoshino, the AST
attacked, blasting Yoshinon away.)

(In order to help Yoshino, I looked for Yoshinon,
discovered Origami had taken possession of it.
I got it back, but the AST captured Yoshino.)

I made a vow. I promised her I'd be her hero.
I said I would save her, but I can't do this
alone!
Tohka, please... Lend me your hand!
Haha. Ah, I see. That is right.

How could I forget?
The man who saved my life has called upon me.

(When the AST attacked, Yoshino created a
huge blizzard. With Tohka's help, we were
able to charge in and save her.)
As promised, I'm back to save you!
Wahh...

(We risked our lives to break into the dome
in order to find Yoshino. She cried from relief,
and I did what needed to be done to save her.)
Shido-san. I'll trust you.

(And so, I had successfully rescued two
Spirits.)

(However, it wasn't that easy. That was most
apparent when I met the third Spirit, Kurumi
Tokisaki.)
I am Kurumi Tokisaki. I am a Spirit.

(Her introduction was the most shocking, as
she transferred to my school. But she chose me
to give her a tour of the school and the city.)

(While on our date, I witnessed something
shocking. I saw Kurumi kill someone.)
Kurumi, what did you...

Isn't it better to kill than be killed?
If you point a gun at someone, then be
prepared to face the consequences.

(I felt pure fear. A world-ending calamity.
Mankind's worst nightmare... The Spirit.
I understood what true fear was.)
Are you safe, Onii-sama?

(As Kurumi prepared to attack me, a girl named
Mana Takamiya, one who called me her real
brother, came to my rescue.)
Are you two siblings?

Hmph. None of your damn business. Go kill
yourself, Nightmare.

(It was a Nightmare, an undying Spirit who
terrorized various towns. Mana had come to
Tengu City to kill it, and attacked Kurumi too.)

Shido, please. Take a look at Kurumi one
more time. No more violence. Do not let
her heart dwindle any further...
Thanks, Tohka.

(Seeing people die actually made me question
if I was doing the right thing, but Tohka's
encouragement motivated me to save Kurumi.)

(The next day, I vowed to Kurumi that I would
save her soul. However, Kurumi killed the version
of herself who believed me, and attacked me.)

Fufu. Kikiki. Kikikikikiki! Now! I shall engrave
despair into you so that you never deceive me
again!

I'm going to need you to give my powers back
to me for a little while, Shido.

(When I thought it was over, my sister Kotori
appeared. She used her flame powers to make
Kurumi's clone retreat, but we didn't seal her.)

(Kotori told me about the tragedy from five years
ago, how she became a Spirit, and my recovery
power was thanks to Kotori's Spirit powers.)

(However, the sacrifice was enormous. In order
to stop Kotori from possibly going berserk, I had
to go on a date with her.)

(Except there was one problem. Origami. Five
years ago, Spirits had killed Origami's parents.
And the Flame Spirit who appeared was Kotori.)

I've been looking for you all this time.
Waiting, searching for you.

At last, I've found you. I've finally found you.
And I'm going to kill you. I swear it. With my
bare hands. Five years of waiting for this.
No, but... I can't believe she...

(Origami had sworn revenge, and she watched
footage of Kotori and Kurumi fighting. She realized
that Kotori was the Flame Spirit and attacked her.)

No... You can't kill! If you do that, you'll
never come back! I-I can't see you that
way!

...I don't care. If I can kill Efreet with my
own hands...!

(With the help of Tohka and Yoshino, I helped
Kotori escape and decided to seal her powers.
Then, Origami's hate would be directed at me.)
Kotori...! Do you love me?!

A-Argh... GOSH! Yes, I do! I do love you! I love
you so much, Onii-chan! I love you more than
anyone else in the world!

(And so I sealed Kotori's powers and faced
Origami once again. By telling her of my
feelings, I was able to convince her.)

(Kotori and I remembered our memories that had
been sealed for five years. The Phantom that had
turned Kotori into a Spirit. Those memories...)

(Then, that long summer, where I was taken
by the good, old days...)
Shido, good morning. I was waiting for you...

(I can see the new landmark in Tengu City, Neo
Tengu Tower. And Rinne Sonogami, my childhood
friend who supposedly grew up next to me.)

If you need me Shido, then I will honor whatever
request you ask of me.

We will date. We will kiss, and be together.
We'll get married and grow old together, but
if you choose someone else, Shido, I don't mind.

Of course, you don't have to choose either.
If you'd rather date them all, I'll support you.
As long as you're happy. Whatever you desire.

I can be your childhood friend, partner, wife,
sister, mother, daughter, boss, subordinate,
enemy, stranger. I only want you to be happy.

(Rinne always encouraged me. Always helping
me take steps forward. I didn't realize it
then... how Rinne's heart began to wither...)

(A world caught in a cycle, Eden. Ruler governed
over this world. But I didn't realize that Rinne
was Ruler all along.)

(While I spent my days with Tohka and the
others, something felt off. Tohka, Origami,
Yoshino, Kurumi, and Kotori...)

(But this world reached its limit eventually.
Rinne watched the cycle repeat itself, and soon,
Eden began to reveal its abnormalities.)
(Finally, I was able to talk to Ruler directly.)

...? Is there a problem with such a thing?
People seek happiness. People dislike mistakes.
Even though I can grant all of this, you would deny it?

...If what I liked came true the way I wanted it, I'm sure it would be
great! But... an inhuman happiness given to me by an unknown entity...
even the small happiness of having earned it myself wouldn't reach!
I―won't accept that this is paradise!

(I denied the existence of this world.
Ruler's shock was enough to destabilize Eden.)

...The end is approaching... Think carefully, one more time...
If even then, you will deny this world...
Then―come and kill me...

(When Ruler disappeared, I chased after her.
With everyone's help, I made it to Neo Tengu
Tower, the barrier's epicenter.)
All right, come at me!
I won't let a single soul pass through me.

(Tohka and the girls handled the Guardians,
and I ascended the tower alone. At the top of
the spiral staircase, there she stood.)
Haha. You've finally come, Shido.
Rinne?! Does that mean I was right?

Hehe. Figured it out? Everything is as you
thought, Shido. I am... Ruler.

(The future I want doesn't exist, Rinne said.
Despite my best efforts, Rinne activated
Paradise Lost, Eden's true form.)

(I was once engulfed by its power, the dream
world. But I remembered my true purpose and
was able to escape from the dream.)

Let's go home together, Rinne. We're
going back to our normal lives. Starting
over from scratch. We don't need Eden!

Don't worry about failure. I'm here.
Everyone's here. You can find happiness
on your own!

(Rinne was taken by Eden's core and entered
sleep. Maybe it was my desperate cry that
separated Rinne from the core.)

(When Rinne lost control, Eden went berserk.
We returned to our daily lives. However, Rinne
asked for herself to be sealed...)

Okay. Got it! That's how we'll make it home.
You're coming too, right?

Yes... I think... that is the only way we can
be together.
(Our lips touched for a split second.

But Rinne's body slowly disintegrated
into light particles.)
Rinne... Your body, what's happening?

You see, I... I'm the only one who can't go
back with you.
What do you mean? But didn't you say―?

Our time together... The days we spent...
are precious to me.

It got me thinking. Maybe Eden was a lie,
but the days with you were all true.
True... happiness...
You see, this whole time, I...
I loved you, Shido...

(With those final cruel words, Rinne Sonogami...
vanished from this world.)

(And I was rescued from Neo Tengu Tower by
the Fraxinus, where Reine-san told me the
truth.)

Firstly, I will tell you that Ruler was an
existence similar yet different to a Spirit.
She wasn't... a Spirit?

(Reine-san told me everything. Rinne was the
bodyless remains of a powerful Spirit, but once
sealed, she loses her vessel, and cannot exist.)

That's correct. Ruler, Rinne Sonogami, created this
world solely... in order to protect you.

(Eden wasn't here to trap me. It was made
to protect me.)

I...I... knew... absolutely nothing...
And I... went and... to Rinne... I... I...!

Please, Shin. Rinne Sonogami simply tried to
save you. If you wish to repay her, then... please.
Instead of regret or apologies, give thanks.
Y...Yes.

(Then, Reine-san handed me a small bag.
She told me she didn't know what was inside.
Even without looking, I had a feeling.)

(Reine-san understood, leaving to check on
Kotori to give me privacy. Eden was about to
disappear, so I wanted to take it in...)

(Upon opening the bag, I found a spare key
inside. Proof that Rinne was my childhood
friend.)

Didn't you promise you'd take care of it, Rinne?
Then, take responsibility. Take it with you!

Otherwise, I'll end up realizing how I won't have
you to wake me in the morning, or ask me how your
food tastes, that I'll no longer see your smile!

Why... Why?! You said... You said we'd be
childhood friends forever... that you wanted
to be together!
RINNEEEEEEEEEEEEE!!

(This fake world was disappearing, along with
the memories we made inside of it. The days
spent with Rinne. She wanted to save me.)

(The world turned white, everything rewound.
Back to before I met Rinne, leaving an incredible
power inside of me...)
